Title: Relates to school bus parking on New York City streets
Summary: Prohibits school bus parking on city streets on weekdays between the hours of 5 p.m. and 5 a.m. and on weekends from 5 p.m. on Friday to 5 a.m. on Monday.
LawCode: Add ยง19-611, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to school bus parking on city streets
